name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice layered with tender halal chicken, slow-cooked with saffron and a blend of aromatic spices. Served with cooling raita.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: A royal Kashmiri delicacy of succulent mutton simmered in a rich, spiced gravy with yogurt and Kashmiri red chilies.

name: Chicken Korma
description: Boneless chicken cooked in a creamy, mildly spiced sauce of yogurt, nuts, and saffron — a true Mughlai classic.

name: Chicken Seekh Kebabs
description: Juicy minced chicken skewers seasoned with herbs and spices, grilled to perfection, and served with mint chutney.

name: Keema Samosas
description: Crispy golden pastries stuffed with spiced minced mutton, served hot with tangy tamarind dip.

name: Shahi Tukda
description: Fried bread soaked in saffron-infused milk, topped with nuts and silver leaf — a dessert fit for royalty.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft, golden dumplings soaked in warm sugar syrup, melting in your mouth with every bite

name: Falooda
description: A sweet and refreshing mix of rose syrup, vermicelli, milk, basil seeds, and ice cream — a festive treat in a glass
